mapper.select: SELECT * FROM calendars ORDER BY subscribed DESC LIMIT 0,#{num};

SELECT calendars.id,calendars.title,calendars.picture, calendars.subscribed,calendars.is_public,calendars.creator_id, subscribes.calendar_id > 0 as is_subscribed FROM calendars LEFT JOIN (SELECT calendar_id FROM calendar_subscribe WHERE user_id = #{userId}) subscribes ON calendars.id = subscribes.calendar_id ORDER BY calendars.created_at DESC LIMIT #{page},#{size};
SELECT calendars.*,users.name as creator_name,users.avatar as creator_avatar FROM calendars LEFT JOIN users ON calendars.creator_id = users.id WHERE calendars.id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE calendars SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, picture = #{picture}, creator_id = #{creatorId}, subscribed = #{subscribed}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, is_public = #{isPublic}, password = #{password}, good_pick = #{goodPick}, bad_pick = #{badPick} WHERE id = #{id}
